text: Welcome Hello! I’m Aditya Khadse, a passionate R user and developer with a focus on creating interactive and engaging data visualizations. This about me page is written in R Quarto, a powerful Markdown language that allows me to seamlessly integrate code, text, and visualizations.

title: Index
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: About
text:
About
Welcome Hello! I’m [Your Name], a passionate R user and developer with a focus on creating interactive and engaging data visualizations. This about me page is written in R Quarto, a powerful Markdown language that allows me to seamlessly integrate code, text, and visualizations.
Background I have [number] years of experience working with R, starting with [initial project or experience]. Since then, I’ve honed my skills in data manipulation, visualization, and storytelling. My expertise lies in [specific areas, e.g., machine learning, data science, or bioinformatics].

Skills
Programming languages: R, Python Data visualization: ggplot2, plotly, shiny Data manipulation: dplyr, tidyr, data.table Machine learning: caret, dplyr, xgboost Projects Some notable projects I’ve worked on include:

[Project 1]: Developed an R Shiny app for [brief description]
[Project 2]: Created an interactive dashboard using plotly and ggplot2 for [brief description]
[Project 3]: Built a machine learning model using caret and dplyr for [brief description] Education I hold a [degree] in [field] from [university]. During my studies, I gained a strong foundation in statistics, computer science, and data analysis.

Contact If you’re interested in collaborating or learning more about my work, feel free to reach out to me at [your email address]. You can also find me on [social media platforms, e.g., GitHub, Twitter, or LinkedIn].

title: About
text:
Work Experience
P360 Solutions (May 2022 - May 2024)
Software Engineer

Developed and maintained over 5 critical software modules, reducing system downtime by 15% and enhancing performance metrics by 20%.
Leveraged my skills to implement 3 major software solutions, improving data processing efficiency by 30% and reducing project completion time by 25%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams across 3 departments to gather requirements, resulting in a 95% user satisfaction rate and a 20% reduction in post-launch bug fixes.
Identified and resolved over 50 critical application issues, leading to a 25% improvement in overall system stability.
Implemented DevOps practices, reducing deployment time by 30% and accelerating the release cycle from monthly to bi-weekly updates.

title: About
text:
Past Accomplishments

Achieved a top 10 ranking out of 600 students in the first semester, reflecting exceptional academic performance and dedication.
Led the organization of the international conference Spandan, with over 500 participants, successfully managing a team of 30 and ensuring a 20% increase in attendance compared to previous years.
Developed and executed marketing strategies for university festivals, increasing event participation by 35% and boosting social media engagement by 50%.
Coordinated the Droid Android development competition with over 100 participants, increasing participation by 25% compared to prior events.

title: About
text:

Seeking to build a career in data analytics, leveraging skills in data analytics and software development to contribute to industry-leading organizations.
